test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_001_Guestuser_checkout_with_Paypal_3Items_each_qty_2_Standard_Gift_message
test.description: This test case is to Place an order as a Guest User with Paypal payment method using 3 Items (Qty 2) with Standard shipping method with Gift message less than 50 characters for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_002_Ecom_RegisterUser_Afterpay_1_item_Standard_Shipping
test.description: This Test case is to place an order as Register user checkout with Afterpay payment-using 1 item-standard shipping method for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_003_Guest_User_Checkout_3different_items_standard_shipment
test.description: This testcase is to place an order as Guest User using Master Card with 3 item using Standard shipping method for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_CS_004_Register_User_Checkout_with_multiple_Items_and_Giftcard_Item_With_CC
test.description: This Test case is to place an CS order via admin with AMEX Payment method using Standard shipping method with 1 item for E2E Validation Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_005_RegisterUser_Klarna_2_Items_Standard_Shipping_with_PO_Box_Address
test.description: This test case is to place an order as a Register user using 2 Items with Standard shipping method and Klarna payment method for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_006_Guest_User_Mutliple_Items_GC_Partial_Redeem_Express_Paypal_Standard_Shipping
test.description: This test case is to place an order as a Guest user with Express paypal Payment method multiple items with Standard shipping method using partial redeem for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_007_GuestUser_checkout_with_CC_2Day_with_Multipleitems_BundleItem_MultipleQty_Giftmessage
test.description: This Test case is to place an order as Guest user with CC payment with multiple products with multiple qty using standard shipping method with Gift message for E2E Process

test.name: Test_DGLD_OXO_E2E_ST_009_Registeruser_checkout_MultipleItems_GiftCode_full_redemption
test.description: This test case is to place an order as a Register user with Multiple items using Full redemption code for E2E Validation process
